content.text: Good, good. I'm just getting ready for work. What are you up to today?
I'm working on a 3d model of a tree. I love doing 3d modeling.
That's cool! I've never tried 3d modeling before. What do you like about it?
I like that I can create anything I can imagine. It's also a lot of fun to learn new software and techniques.
That does sound like fun. I'm not very creative, so I don't think I'd be very good at it.
You don't have to be creative to be good at 3d modeling. It just takes practice.
I guess I could give it a try. Do you have any tips for beginners?
Sure! The most important thing is to just start. Don't be afraid to make mistakes. You'll learn from them and get better with time.
Okay, I'll try to remember that. Thanks for the advice!
No problem! I hope you have fun trying it out.
